title: Discover admiral Functions
text: repository reference users admiral family packages discover various admiral-related pieces information. Variable Listing tab, users can explore functions can used derive many variables parameters ADaM data sets. Presentation Archive tab, users can find collection presentations featuring admiral related packages. Use links navigation bar browse contents repository.

title: Report Package Versions — admiral_pkg_versions
text: Function returns string listing packages versions.

title: Report Package Versions — admiral_pkg_versions
code: admiral_pkg_versions() #> admiral v1.2.0.9007, admiralonco v1.2.0, admiralophtha v1.2.0.9000, admiralvaccine v0.4.0, and admiralmetabolic v0.1.0

title: Admiral Function Discovery — discovery
text: object class spec_tbl_df (inherits tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) 424 rows 9 columns.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: get_admiral_deprecated(): Returns tibble deprecated functions admiral, admiralonco, admiralophtha, admiralvaccine packages. get_admiral_superseded(): Returns tibble superseded functions admiral, admiralonco, admiralophtha, admiralvaccine packages. get_fns_with_keyword(): Returns character vector functions passed keyword help file. example, function can used find deprecated superseded functions admiral universe, admiral package include #' @keywords deprecated #' @keywords superseded function's roxygen2 comments.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
code: get_admiral_deprecated()  get_admiral_superseded()  get_fns_with_keyword(package, keyword, lib.loc = NULL)

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: package character string naming installed package. keyword string keyword identify lib.loc character vector directory names R libraries,     NULL.  default value NULL corresponds     libraries currently known.  specified library trees used     search package.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: character vector function names

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
code: get_admiral_deprecated() #> # A tibble: 7 × 2 #>   package fn                          #>   <chr>   <chr>                       #> 1 admiral date_source                 #> 2 admiral derive_param_extreme_record #> 3 admiral derive_var_dthcaus          #> 4 admiral derive_var_extreme_dt       #> 5 admiral derive_var_extreme_dtm      #> 6 admiral dthcaus_source              #> 7 admiral get_summary_records         get_admiral_superseded() #> # A tibble: 8 × 2 #>   package       fn                          #>   <chr>         <chr>                       #> 1 admiralonco   derive_param_bor            #> 2 admiralonco   derive_param_clinbenefit    #> 3 admiralonco   derive_param_confirmed_bor  #> 4 admiralonco   derive_param_confirmed_resp #> 5 admiralonco   derive_param_response       #> 6 admiralonco   filter_pd                   #> 7 admiralophtha derive_var_bcvacritxfl      #> 8 admiralophtha derive_var_bcvacritxfl_util get_fns_with_keyword(package = "admiral", keyword = "superseded") #> NULL
